attributes.action: Letting Fans Back In Football Stadiums
attributes.additional_details:
We want them to find it in there hearts to help out and let fans attend football games again to pump some revenue into the club's they support, we obviously want them to do it following the Social Distancing guidelines and to let fans in 

Let Fans In is a campaign going around and it has been recognised by BBC and Sky Sports this is the same as that campaign
attributes.background: We are looking to get fans back in stadiums following the Coronavirus Pandemic, Non League Football clubs are going bust because they are not getting any funding from the FA to keep them alive, we want this to change and you to let fans back in to stadiums

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334366
